title: Cover, ca. 1960
medium: Technique: applique of plain weave and embroidery on plain weave background; lined with plain weave
description: Men and women on white background with border of triangles using same colors as people. Four shades of pink, blue, orange-gold and green-gold. Lining is dark pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, ca. 1960.
ca. 1960. Technique: applique of plain weave and embroidery on plain weave background; lined with plain weave. Gift of Janet Laib Gottlieb. 1994-83-1.
